title: Quordle today - hints and answers for Sunday, September 3 (game #587)
description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 celebrates its PS5 launch with this teaser trailer
description: Baldur's Gate 3 is available now for Collector's Edition and Digital Deluxe Edition players on PS5, and out for everyone Sept. 6.

title: This is Starfield's touching tribute to a fan who didn't get to play
description: Starfield includes a bittersweet tribute to a long-time fan who never got to play the game.

title: Armored Core 6 PC players should not let their PC go into sleep mode - here's why
description: FromSoft apologizes after discovering a save bug that affects save data if PC are put to sleep.

title: Apple's iOS 17 is a lot more exciting than Android 14, but that's not totally a good thing
description: Apple's new iOS 17 is a lot more feature-packed than Android 14, but that's just a tactical difference.

title: New Google Pixel 8 leak reveals expected European pricing
description: If these leaked prices for Europe are true, then the Pixel 8 is going to cost more than the Pixel 7 did.

title:
Spotify stats: the 7 best websites for 
getting data and insights on your music
description: Look outside the walls of Spotify, and there are a host of third-party plug-ins that can do wonders with your stats.

title: Unlikely rumor points to an iPhone 15 Pro Max and an iPhone 15 Ultra
description: We've been hearing both of these names for a while now, and they might refer to separate devices.

title: Apple could be 3D printing its new iPhone cases
description: 3D-printed enclosures for the next generation of Apple Watches and even iPhones could be coming.

title: Bad news – your superfast gigabit fiber network is no match for… a pigeon with a flash drive attached to it?
description: It's quicker to upload data using carrier pigeons up to a distance of 500 miles away than it is using gigabit broadband.
